Copies

Sometimes, we want to be able to specify how many copies an object should have. To specify how many copies, click the copies slot near the object's name and edit it like a cell. Its value can be an array (e.g. [1,2,3]) or a number (e.g. 3, which would be equivalent to [1,2,3]). Every copy gets two additional fields:

  • my_copy: The copy's item
  • copy_num: The copy's index (1-indexed)
Note that because the editor doesn't yet display individual copies, my_copy and copy_num will appear as undefined

Try changing the number of copies of OBJ to ['X','Y','Z']

Creating HTML elements End
